Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $299.99 - $219.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:08:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Series E I Office Desk Chair

Series J I Office Desk Chair

Ergonomic Desgin: Big & tall executive office chair has Double layer soft cushion can keep you away from the numbness caused by long sitting.Thickened headrest and backrest fit to the curve of human spine can give you strong support and help you release back pressure.
High-Quality Material: This executive office chair upholstered in high-quality PU leather. It’s a soft, lustrous, durable and water-proof. Comfortable cushion consis of native sponge and PP cotton, soft and resilient.
Flexible Using Style: You can flip the arms up and do things that can’t be done in other chairs, such as playing guitar or sitting cross-legged. You can also put the chair under the desk for saving space by fliping up the arms.
Adjustable Function: The pneumatic seat height adjustment can meets your different needs.Rocking backwards from 90 to 125 degree can relax you in spare time.degree. 360 degree rotation cushion and rolling swivel caster make this desk chair more flexible and convenient.
Assembly and Security: Certified by BIFMA and weight support up to 330 pounds. Besides, It’s easy to assembly, and you will not need to prepare additional tools for the assembly.
Customer Warranty Service: Hbada provides three years warranty that is processed in the most hassle-free way possible. Customer-first is the original aspiration of Hbada.No matter what problems you encounter during use, you can contact us. We will provide you with professional services on the product.

Flip-Up Armrest

Padded flip-up armrests provide a soft support and allow you to make the most of your space.

Rocking Function

Chair can be rocked front and back about 25 degree, you can have a leisurely break while sit on the chair.

Comfortable Cushion

The double-layer cushion consists of polypropylene cotton and native sponge, relieve the pain from long time sitting.

Read more

PU-leather ergonomic office chair

About this chair

An Executive chair with a high-back features a PU leather exterior to provide a timeless style that fits in nearly any room. Pneumatic, seat-height adjustment allows a variety of users to sit comfortably at their desks. 360-degree swivel allows you to effortlessly rotate the chair for added convenience.

Product description

  • Adjustable height
  • Flip-up arms
  • 360 degree swivel
  • Double layer support
  • High-end soft Pu leather

For different occassions:

  • Bedrooms
  • Office
  • Study room
  • Meeting room
  • Conference room

Read more

4
Price: $299.99 - $219.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:08:50 UTC – Details)

item.title: NOBLEWELL Ergonomic Office Chair, Office Chair High Back, Mesh Computer Chair with Lumbar Support, 3D Armrest, Double Backrest and Adjustable Headrest
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Ergonomic Lumbar Support: The double-backrest is designed according to the curve of the human spine, it really fits the body. Supports the back and lumbar at the same time, you can fully feel the support and curvature of the lumbar, computer chair provides stronger comfort and balance the pressure on ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $269.99 - $155.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:51:22 UTC – Details)



Ergonomic Lumbar Support: The double-backrest is designed according to the curve of the human spine, it really fits the body. Supports the back and lumbar at the same time, you can fully feel the support and curvature of the lumbar, computer chair provides stronger comfort and balance the pressure on different parts of your body.
Breathable Mesh Seat: The full mesh office chair is made of nylon mesh for better insulation and moisture resistance.The surface is soft and skin-friendly to avoid sweating and sticking. High quality mesh has long time support, long sitting without deformation, suitable for long office hours.
300Lbs Weight Capacity: The strong gas cylinder of the ergonomic office chair has been thoroughly safety tested, while the thick chassis provides strong pressure resistance and higher security. Aluminum legs, 360° silent casters roll smoothly and effectively protect floors.
Multi-Adjustable Design: This office chair comfortable features an 18.1 ~ 22 inches adjustable seat height, +/-2” adjustable headrest for better support, and 3D armrests that are adjustable toward the front, back, up, down, left, and right. Truly ergonomic mesh office chairs promote healthy posture.
130° Reclining Tilt: Are you tired during long office hours? Easily tilt the desk chair up to 130° by pulling out the lift handle, and push the handle back to lock the position. You can enjoy a moment of relaxation at work and helps increase productivity.

4.5
Price: $269.99 - $155.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:51:22 UTC – Details)

PREMIUM MATERIAL: The center console armrest box pad is made of premium skin-feeling PU leather, which is thick enough to protect your car from pet claws, dirt and sticky fingers.
Perfect Design: Perfect fiber leather double-line embossing series, easy to run, the bottom silicone anti-slip design, add a fashion sense to your car.
Simple installation: No tools are required for installation, just place it on the armrest box, and use the two non-slip elastic buckles at the bottom.
Worry-free after sale: You can buy our brand new armrest box cover with confidence, if you have any questions about the product, please consult our customer service staff, they will give you a satisfactory answer.

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $78.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:29:41 UTC – Details)


Amazon Basics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest – Black
Height-adjustable padded seat with adjustable seat angle, tilt control and padded armrests
KD metal base with durable caster wheels for smooth-rolling mobility
Supports up to 275 pounds; BIFMA certified; assembly instructions included
Components including casters/base/arms/seat mechanism/hardware kit are packed in back cushion
Chair dimensions: 23.75 x 26 x 38.25-42 inches (WxDxH); seat width: 19.5 inches; seat depth: 17.75 inches; arm height: 26.25-30 inches

All-Day Comfort

The desk chair’s modern profile offers a professional look for any office, while smooth contours and adjustable settings allow for all-day comfort.

Adjustable Features

Featuring pneumatic controls for raising and lowering the seat, position tilt mechanism, and a tilt-tension knob for adjusting the chair’s motion.

Bonded Leather

Upholstered in bonded faux leather, the chair features a padded backrest and seat with curved nylon armrests with padding for added comfort.

Rolling Caster Wheels

Set on a sturdy 5-point base, you can pivot between projects and enjoy smooth mobility with the chair’s durable rolling caster wheels.

Price: $78.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:29:41 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Raises your center console, enhance your armrest comfort with Timorn memory foam auto support arms for cars!

Car arm support is a great gift for car lover.

Memory foam auto driving set arm rest

Providing added arm rest protection from pet claws, dirt and sticky fingersCenter in pad with original memory foam and using the finest cottonErgonomic design driving seat armrest and a luxurious interiorThe durable and breathable cover of car seat arm rest can be removed for cleaning.Enjoy memory foam comfort on the long hauls with car seat armrest.

Add comfort without blocking access to the storage area

Vehicle armrest pad materials : Polyester, Padding Fabrics (Memory foam) Driving console cushion external material: PolyesterCar arm rest pillow size: 30*16*11cm(11.8*6.3*4.3 inch)

Package includes: 1 x memory foam pad arm support for car

ATTENTION: Please check the size carefully to see if this arm support car is right for your vehicle. The car armrest pillow is in vacuum packaging, kindly wait for a while for it recover to full state after open the package

Easy installation drivers arm rest pad

Size
12*8.2*1.5 inch 12.2 x 6.69 x 3.94 inches ‎2 x 1.8 x 0.8 inches 2.68 x 1.5 x 0.67 inches ‎2 x 1.8 x 0.8 inches

Features
Universal size fit more car console. Memory foam material bring you comfortable support. Thick memory foam armrest cushion, provide soft support for elbow. Waterproof universal hour meter suitable for all two stroke (single/twin/3/6 cylinders) & four stroke (single/twin/3/4/5/6/8/12 cylinders) gasoline engines. Widely applied in industrial implements, agriculture, construction machinery and powersports, work with universal engine. Widely used in industrial, agriculture, construction machinery, suitable for all two stroke & four stroke gasoline engines.

MATERIAL: The car armrest cushion is made from memory foam that is slow rebound, relieve the pressure, so that the body feels relaxed and comfortable. The black arm rest cover is good interior accessories for truck, auto, suv, van, vehicle, minivan, automotive
AUTO COZY INVENTION: The car armrest pad has a brand new ergonomic design which provides an extreme comfort supporting to the arm, perfect for people who are suffering from serious per arthritis or driving long time everyday with wrist fatigue. As a driver, you can put elbow on the extension pillow of middle organizer box when seat in the car
PREMIUM MEMORY FOAM PADDING: We upgraded the inside filler to quality memory foam material to guarantee a long service life, it keeps the shape and regain the shape quite quickly after extruding, great for shipping and storage. The replacement central extender also works as protector to avoid your cute dog or small pet scratching the centre counsel lid, the fabric cloth outside is removable and washable
HASSLE-FREE INSTALLATION: The car center console armrest cushion is easily attached on the console lid with two elastic straps without sliding, you can adjust the strap length to fit any type of consoles(for the cover opened from front to rear). Add or remove a soft padded hand holder to consol compartment in minute
UNIVERSAL: Adjustable elastic strap of the center console armrest fits around most mid-size vehicle center console. The portable protective covering riser cusion give a super protection padding for centre council handrest panel top

Product Description

Car Armrest Cover

[Product Specifications] Color: Black Brown. Size: about 13″ * 8″ * 2″ Material: Made of high quality PU and memory foam material. Durable, scratch and stain resistant[Easy to install] The armrest cover is designed with elastic bands and the edges are also processed with rubber bands. Place the armrest on the top and pull down to fine-tune the armrest[Comfortable Padding] Soft and comfortable one-piece quick rebound memory foam padding makes it easy to relax your elbows, arms, wrist armrests, wrist rests[Stain Resistant & Easy to Clean] Protect your car armrest box from spills, scuffs and sticky fingers.[Features] Armrest console pad with excellent stability and body pressure distribution for easy use between the driver and passenger seat. Fits various seat armrests

Note: This car armrest cushion is sized to fit most cars on the market, please measure your car console before placing your order.

This car armrest cushion is made of pure memory foam so your elbow will get comfortable supports when you put your arms on this car console pad.The inner memory foam will recover soon because of its high elasticity when your put arms upon it for long time.It will relax your elbow pain and bring you comfortable driving feelings.The armrest cushion pad adds about 2.2 inches on your car console.

Size: The size of the armrest covering cover is 12.5*8.4*2 inch which fits most popular cars

You don’t need worry about water or coffee leaving stains on your car console. No matter sweat, soda or coffee something else. This car armrest cushion surface is waterproof so you can use wet wipes to clean this armrest pad up easily.The premium outer leather can prevent scratches from your dog or cat so they will not damage your car console when they are in your car.

If you drive your car for long hours every day, then this quality car armrest pad will be the optimal choice for you.

If the armrest slips, please use transparent double side adhesive tape to add stability.

Not only the driver can enjoy the soft comfort of this car armrest pad, but also the person sitting on the passenger side can enjoy it together.
